text: Avoid the MSI GL Series GL73 8SE-028 17.3" 120 Hz Intel Core i5 8th Gen 8300H (2.30 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop if you can. The NVIDIA RTX 2060 is okay, but the cons outweigh the pros. The screen developed dead pixels within a month.. Looking to return it.

It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Valorant, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the MSI GL Series GL73 8SE-028 17.3" 120 Hz Intel Core i5 8th Gen 8300H (2.30 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop. The trackpad is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA RTX 2060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The screen brightness is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the MSI GL Series GL73 8SE-028 17.3" 120 Hz Intel Core i5 8th Gen 8300H (2.30 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop!

The MSI GL Series GL73 8SE-028 17.3" 120 Hz Intel Core i5 8th Gen 8300H (2.30 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for AAA gaming, but the keyboard could be better. Had a minor issue with driver updates being a bit tricky, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Fortnite, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the MSI GL Series GL73 8SE-028 17.3" 120 Hz Intel Core i5 8th Gen 8300H (2.30 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop. The screen brightness is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.
